pages.text: Sometimes, it is desirable to avoid certain enchantments entirely during the enchanting process.$(p)The $(9)Seashelf of Aquatic Filtration$() allows you to do just that.

pages.title: Aquatic Filtration
pages.text: The shelf allows you to insert up to six single-enchantment books in it, preventing those enchantments from appearing.

To use it, simply insert a single-enchantment book of an enchantment you wish to blacklist.$(p)The enchantment will then no longer be available in the Enchanting Table.$(p)The shelf will also gain $(eterna) and $(arcana) based on the number of books inserted.

Note: books can be inserted the same way you use a chiseled bookshelf, and the shelf must be in a valid bookshelf slot to operate.$(p)Blacklisted enchantments will be reflected in the $(l:apotheosis:enchanting/table/info)Enchanting Info Screen$().
